title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Biden-appointed federal judge keeps blocking Trump admin from nixing funding for lawyers for migrant children
items.description: Court continues blocking Trump administration from cutting off funding for legal aid for unaccompanied alien minors, issuing a preliminary injunction.

items.title: Trump to name Haitian gangs foreign terrorist organizations: report
items.description: The Trump administration reportedly told Congress it will designate the Haitian gangs Viv Ansanm and Gran Grif as foreign terrorist organizations.

items.title: RFK Jr. Gets One Right
items.description: He’s correct in questioning the Covid-19 vaccine’s inclusion on the schedule for children.

items.title: Private hiring slowed in April out of fear of tariff impacts. ‘Unease is the word of the day,’ ADP chief economist says
items.description: These job gains were even lower than economists had expected.

items.title: Trump says he 'could' get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador prison
items.description: President Trump said he could get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from a Salvadoran prison if he were a "gentleman."

items.title: U.S. economy contracted in first quarter, fueling recession concerns
items.description: The U.S. economy shrank in the first quarter of the year, a sign that President Trump's tariffs are starting to impact businesses.

items.title: Stock markets tank on bad GDP news as Trump puts blame on ‘Biden’s stock market’
items.description: Dow falls more than 750 at one point.

items.title: America’s child care crunch is keeping parents from running for public office because they simply ‘cannot make it all work,’ state senator says
items.description: Stephanie Chang said she used to race across the state with her baby so she could make 9 a.m. committee meetings at the state Capitol.

items.title: Michigan Law Would Let You Register To Vote Unless You Prove You’re Not A Citizen
items.description: 'Michigan elections are already [in] shambles. Now, HB 4983 will turn our elections into the wild west,' said state Rep. Rachelle Smit.

items.title: Cruz escalates feud with ex-Iranian official working at Princeton: ‘You should be deported’
items.description: Sen. Ted Cruz said in comments on X that Princeton faculty Seyed Hossein Mousavian should be deported.

items.title: Decline Of Christianity Sparks Rise In Claims For Religious Protections Of Psychedelics
items.description: Well-funded and led by scholars, lawyers, religious leaders, and entrepreneurs, the goal is to obtain U.S. legalization of psychedelics.

items.title: Microsoft says it will ‘vigorously’ contest any government orders to halt cloud operations in Europe: ‘If we ever find ourselves losing we will put in place business continuity arrangements’
items.description: European leaders are alarmed about Trump's policy changes that throw into doubt his administration's commitment to the trans-Atlantic relationship.

items.title: How much deterioration in the world’s largest economy could be traced to Trump’s policies? ‘All of it,’ one economist says
items.description: GDP and hiring have both sunk as a result of Trump upending decades of American trade policy.

items.description: The sanctimonious proto-Communist bait of Good Night, and Good Luck .

items.title: 50 Years After Vietnam, Our Troops Remain Demoralized By Defeat
